items.sentence: I know the president of that club very well.
I think there are lots of sites to see here.
They're going to kick me out of the country.
My father has assured us that that was true.
Tom left without saying anything to anybody.
I think it's time to flip the pancakes over.
Tom left the fridge door open, so I shut it.
Tom was charged with obstruction of justice.
Nobody I know would say something like that.
Tom was involved in a very serious accident.
It looks like you've just had your hair cut.
Differences are what makes life interesting.
Tell me why you've decided to quit your job.
I had no idea that Mary was your girlfriend.
I was handed a note when I entered the gate.
Give Tom this message as soon as he arrives.
I went there for the purpose of meeting Tom.
There's no need for Tom to go there himself.
I think I fell asleep during the last class.
I don't know if I have enough time to do it.
